concept.title: Add Related Answers
concept.shortdesc: Customers can view a list of answers that are relevant to a specific answer that they have accessed. Links to the related answers appear beneath the answer displayed on the Answer Detail page of an article. By default, the widget displays five answers, but can be configured for a maximum of twenty answers. Set up requires selecting the View Related Answers option at the content type level (Repository Content Type Properties page) in the Authoring console. Selecting this option enables only documents of the same content type. The relationship of a specific answer to related answers is defined in Information Manager by adding links to the related answers. The links can be added manually or automatically by Analytics as learned links. Articles linked manually have priority and are listed above learned links. For more information on content type properties, see “Add General Properties” in Service Cloud Knowledge Advanced Administration Guide.

conbody.p: Add the following line of code to include the Related Answer widget on pages/answers/answer_view.php.
Make sure that the View Related Answers option is selected in the Feedback tab in Authoring.
